alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 20 at 1:35PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A line of heavy snow showers will impact portions of northwestern Clinton, northern Franklin and northeastern St. Lawrence Counties through 300 PM EST... At 130 PM EST, a line of heavy snow showers were reported near Massena, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds 35 mph or greater, and visibility down to a mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid changes in visibility and light snow accumulating on road surfaces may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Massena, Norfolk, Mooers, Louisville, Moira, Bangor, Fort Covington, Bombay, Ellenburg Depot, Bryants Mill, Massena International Airport - Richards Field, Helena, Burke, Merrill, Brushton, Lawrenceville, Malone, Churubusco, Chateaugay and Norwood.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly with this line of snow showers. Be prepared for snow covered roads and rapid decreases in visibility especially along NY Highway 11. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
